page.title: 19Newspapers and Television
page.content: Newspapers nowadays exaggerate a lot. Many people think that they say things which they shouldn't or add things on to stories which might not be true. This is especially the case with the Royal family. Newspapers are always writing things about them and it must be really hard for all members of the Royal family.They cannot go anywhere without being hounded by the press. A good recent example of this is Princess Michael of Kent. She has suffered terribly because of the accusations made against her father, who had been a member of Hitlers SS. Television news tends to be a little better because it usually just deals with the facts.Television is not too bad in England and most of our programmes are better than the American ones we import.
